battleResultsFormat: <textformat leading='-2' tabstops='[5, 250]'>	<font color='#FFFFFF' size='15'>{mapName} - {battleType}	WN8: <font color='{c:wn8}'>{wn8} ({xwn8})</font>  EFF: <font color='{c:eff}'>{eff} ({xeff})</font></font></textformat>
format: WN8: <font color='{c_wn8}'>{wn8}</font> EFF: <font color='{c_eff}'>{eff}</font> DIFF: <font color='{c_diff}'>{diff}</font>
